title: São Lázaro Chapel
body:
There was a chapel of this invocation in the parish of Santa Cruz, which was instituted by João Afonso Escudeiro at the beginning of the 16th century (See Bemposta).

The chapel of the former Saint Lazarus hospital, now a civil prison (1921), has the same invocation.

See Saint Lazarus Hospital.

Santa Cruz: Located in the parish of Santa Cruz

João Afonso Escudeiro: Institutor of the chapel dedicated to São Lázaro in the parish of Santa Cruz

Século XVI: Institution of the chapel dedicated to São Lázaro in the parish of Santa Cruz
